name: Crusader Kings II: Legacy of Rome
name_original: Crusader Kings II: Legacy of Rome
description:
Crusader Kings II: Legacy of Rome is a strategy game developed by Paradox Development Studio. It came out on 16-10-2012. It was published by Paradox Interactive. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Crusader Kings II: Legacy of Rome on PC.
